00039     void set_low_memory_mode(bool on) { 
00040       if (on) {
00041         if (m_prioritizer != &m_prioritizer_low_memory)
00042           m_prioritizer = &m_prioritizer_low_memory;
00043       }
00044       else {
00045         if (m_prioritizer != &m_prioritizer_log_cleanup)
00046           m_prioritizer = &m_prioritizer_log_cleanup;
00047       }
00048     }
00049 
00050     void need_scheduling() { 
00051       m_scheduling_needed = true;
00052     }
00053 
00054     void update_stats_bytes_loaded(uint32_t n) {
00055       m_stats.update_stats_bytes_loaded(n);
00056     }
00057 
00058   private:
00059 
00060     bool low_memory_mode() { 
00061       return m_prioritizer == &m_prioritizer_low_memory;
00062     }
00063     
00064     Mutex m_mutex;
00065     bool m_initialized;
00066     bool m_scheduling_needed;
